profile.post_content:
Flyer is concerned with the development of cultural projects, services and solutions between art and technology for either public or private institutions and organizations. Our field of action involves 3 macro areas:

  • Cultural Productions and Events
  • Websites and Apps
  • FLxER Creative Collective

Throughout the years Flyer acquired expertise in the production of cultural events related to Audio Visual Performing Arts, in the creation of web sites, platforms, social media, communication and video mapping, installations, performances and workshops with the collective FLxER. .
Flyer has received many awards, prizes and, in particular, public and private grants for both internal and external projects, thanks to a fund raising work. For more details, see the Awards & Grants section.

We are currently offering to public and private institutions and organizations a wide range of services and products: curatorship, planning and production of events; setting up and organisation of events, reviews and festivals in the field of Audio Visual Performing Arts; planning and creation of applications to be employed on web, including mobile and web-based Apps; video mapping, installations, performances and workshops.

Time and experience have led us to combine skills, professionalism and imagination. We are a team of creative people, technology experts, communication advisors, video artists and performers.

We share the same philosophy: we suggest new and innovative solutions with a high degree of personalization, detecting the constant changes that take place in the present world.

Our suggestions aim at a free and innovative use of the tools available, combining strategy and creativity to improve the image and our relations with the environment in which we operate.

profile.wpcf-row-1-col-1-html-box:
Cultural Productions

Flyer’s unique feature lies in the capability to create a product starting from zero, supported by its wide experience achieved through the realization of its numerous projects: FLxER, one of the first software to manage live videos, LPM (the major event in Audio Visuals Performing Arts from 2004 up to now), Live Cinema Festival, Fotonica Festival and others, thanks to the experience in managing partnerships.

Flyer is a leader in the design for national and local European calls, based on cooperation at many levels.

Read more

Portfolio:
Productions Partnerships Awards & Grants
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-1-html-box-original:
Cultural Productions

Flyer’s unique feature lies in the capability to create a product starting from zero, supported by its wide experience achieved through the realization of its numerous projects: FLxER, one of the first software to manage live videos, LPM (the major event in Audio Visuals Performing Arts from 2004 up to now), Live Cinema Festival, Fotonica Festival and others, thanks to the experience in managing partnerships. Flyer is a leader in the design for national and local European calls, based on cooperation at many levels.
Read more Portfolio: Productions Partnerships Awards & Grants
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-2-html-box:
Web Sites & Apps

Flyer, for over 20 years, offers consultancy, services and products related to the design and implementation of projects for the web: websites, web-based applications, management platforms, content creation, community and social network management, statistical analysis and reports on access, maintenance and service, art direction and graphic layout processing, implementation of features and accessible code programming, online publishing, creation and updating of content, maintenance and hardware and software support.
The final objective is to make a product of digital craft, made to measure for the project.

Read more

Portfolio:
Siti Web & Apps
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-2-html-box-original:
Web Sites & Apps

Flyer, for over 20 years, offers consultancy, services and products related to the design and implementation of projects for the web: websites, web-based applications, management platforms, content creation, community and social network management, statistical analysis and reports on access, maintenance and service, art direction and graphic layout processing, implementation of features and accessible code programming, online publishing, creation and updating of content, maintenance and hardware and software support. The final objective is to make a product of digital craft, made to measure for the project.
Read more Portfolio: Siti Web & Apps
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-3-html-box:
FLxER Creative Collective

Video mappings, interactive installations, Performances and Workshops are projects born within the experimental research laboratory of Flyer. They have become the result of important prizes and awards, as well as protagonists of hundreds of prestigious artistic and cultural events of international orientation. It is within these projects that one of the first software in the world was created to use the video in the performative field: FLxER (that takes its name from the project itself).

This is how the most experimental and artistic side of Flyer starts, distinguishing itself in the last twenty years for the innovative, original and experimental nature of its collective, which since 2000 is the protagonist of the international artistic scene.

FLxER Web Site >>

content.rendered:
New website and related app for viewing the first and only TV dedicated to Audio Visuals Performing Arts.

The TV schedule is created entirely with content from the largest community in the sector: AVnode.net

The daily programming is:

06:00 – 12:00 Documentary
Here is a collection of workshops, interview and report live video related.

12:00 – 18:00 Video
All those videos are made from vjs and audio visual artists so you could find a lots of differences in technical and style.

18:00 – 00:00 Performances
This is the time of the audio visual performances, live cinema, mapping, generative and many other styles of live performances.

00:00 – 06:00 VJ-DJ Sets
Let’s get party with the best VJ from all over the world.

Site made entirely in NodeJS and the WordPress and AVnode APIs.

excerpt.rendered: New website and related app for viewing the first and only TV dedicated to Audio Visuals Performing Arts. The TV…

content.rendered:
New step forward for the community and database AVnode.net build from Flyer, a project of the Dutch AVnode Foundation which inherits the data of the historic FLxER.net community, becoming the most important reference point for Audio Visuals Arts.

This third phase, after importing all the FLxER data into the first one and the activation of the “call for proposals” engine, now is allowed to manage the partners and many other tools are now available to the many members organizations.

The new platform is entirely built in NodeJS and MongoDB.

excerpt.rendered: New step forward for the community and database AVnode.net build from Flyer, a project of the Dutch AVnode Foundation which…

content.rendered:
New website for the project!

The contents of the site are also available for smartphones.

On the site you can find information about the program and the locations, the artists and the installations and performances, as well as the many social activities of the project.

Born from the collaboration between Fusolab, Flyer and Liceo Scientifico Statale Francesco D’Assisi, the project – winner of the “Scuola attiva la cultura” call launched by MIBACT within the Cultura Futuro Urbano plan – aims to enhance the cultural paths already present in the area with the ambition to create new ones.

Site created entirely in WordPress and the Firebase and MapBox APIs.

content.rendered:
New web site for the new edition of Live Performers Meeting, LPM 2020 Rome!

The contents of the site are also available via smartphone.

On the site you can find information about the program and the locations, artists and performances, and view materials and content of previous editions.

Web site fully done in NodeJS and the API of WordPress and AVnode.

results.news:
Join us and keep you up-to-date with Flyer activities throughout the year: from events in collaboration with our partners to workshops and performances presented by Flyer during international festivals. This especially to be the first to have the latest news on trends in the field of Audio Visuals Performing Arts and Technologies!

In this section are exposed the activities related to the many cultural productions, partnerships, websites and apps (that you can find in the portfolio section)

What are you waiting for? Come in! We are waiting for you!

events.post_content:
Flyer is a professional reality totally focused on the conception and production of projects involving Audio Visuals Arts, being able to offer complete production and individual services, from curatorship to communication, for minor and major events. That’s why Flyer makes possible even the most ambitious projects.

Here you can find the hundreds of cultural projects curated and produced by Flyer since 1999:

avnode.about:
Flyer is concerned with the development of cultural projects, services and solutions between art and technology for either public or private institutions and organizations. Our field of action involves 3 macro areas:

  • Cultural Productions and Events

  • Websites and Apps

  • FLxER Creative Collective


Throughout the years Flyer acquired expertise in the production of cultural events related to Audio Visual Performing Arts, in the creation of web sites, platforms, social media, communication and video mapping, installations, performances...
avnode.aboutFull:
Flyer is concerned with the development of cultural projects, services and solutions between art and technology for either public or private institutions and organizations. Our field of action involves 3 macro areas:

  • Cultural Productions and Events

  • Websites and Apps

  • FLxER Creative Collective


Throughout the years Flyer acquired expertise in the production of cultural events related to Audio Visual Performing Arts, in the creation of web sites, platforms, social media, communication and video mapping, installations, performances and workshops with the collective FLxER. .
Flyer has received many awards, prizes and, in particular, public and private grants for both internal and external projects, thanks to a fund raising work. For more details, see the Awards & Grants section.

We are currently offering to public and private institutions and organizations a wide range of services and products: curatorship, planning and production of events; setting up and organisation of events, reviews and festivals in the field of Audio Visual Performing Arts; planning and creation of applications to be employed on web, including mobile and web-based Apps; video mapping, installations, performances and workshops.

Time and experience have led us to combine skills, professionalism and imagination. We are a team of creative people, technology experts, communication advisors, video artists and performers.

We share the same philosophy: we suggest new and innovative solutions with a high degree of personalization, detecting the constant changes that take place in the present world.

Our suggestions aim at a free and innovative use of the tools available, combining strategy and creativity to improve the image and our relations with the environment in which we operate.
avnode.description:
Flyer is concerned with the development of cultural projects, services and solutions between art and technology for either public or private institutions and organizations. Our field of action involves 3 macro areas:
 
 	 Cultural Productions and Events 
 	 Websites and Apps 
 	 FLxER Creative 
 a

results.partnerships:
Flyer, right from the start, has based its activities on intense relations with local, national and international partners.The work process is organized and managed as a whole: from the selection of artists, the design of interventions, up to the production of the event. This has allowed, in addition to the many Flyer productions, hundreds of partnerships around the world. Many of these partnerships since 2008 have also become prestigious international cooperation projects and have received local and European funding.

Here you can find all the partnership managed by Flyer:

page_data.description: Flyer is an all media agency that develops services and solutions between technology and communication in the web, live video and performances.
page_data.headtitle: Flyer new media | Creativity and tools for cutting edge events
